question: Who has won the 2017 Time Magazine's Most Influential Person Reader's poll?
explanation: Philippine President Rodrigo Duterte has won the 2017 Time magazine\'s readers\' poll of the 100 most influential people in the world. Duterte got 5% of the total \"yes\" votes in the poll, which closed on April 16, 2017. The official TIME 100 list, which is selected by TIME\'s editors, will be announced on April 20, 2017.
